bill.title: CON; suspend statutory restrictions on issuance of for certain health care facilities until July 1, 2012.
bill.description: An Act To Amend Section 41-7-191, Mississippi Code Of 1972, To Provide That The Statutory Restrictions On The Issuance Of Certificates Of Need For Nursing Facilities, Psychiatric Residential Treatment Facilities, Child/adolescent Psychiatric Beds And Child/adolescent Chemical Dependency Beds In Hospitals, Psychiatric Hospitals And Chemical Dependency Hospitals, Intermediate Care Facilities For The Mentally Retarded, And Home Health Agencies Shall Be Suspended Until July 1, 2012; And For Related Purposes.

step.action: Referred To Public Health and Human Services;Appropriations
